TopicTitle: Any way to view a design summary screen?

Articles.Content: Sorry if this is in the wrong place, but I\'m wondering, is there some page somewhere in the build screen perhaps that shows the raw details of a design? Things such as the actual thrust numbers, fuel amounts, weight, etc - broken up both by stage, but also for the rocket/plane as a whole, instead of having to count it up manually based on which components are used?

Not currently since most of that information would be based on off the top of the head numbers. Until the most recent versions, the parts that the game came with were really intended as placeholders so all the numbers were pulled from this air without much thought. Now that Nova and C7 are working on parts, I expect that data to get better leading to the need to have that information being displayed.

I do believe someone has made a utility that will read a .craft file and generate those stats.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
